snippet: The U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday it has sued in court to recover $700,000 in alleged corruption proceeds traced to former South Korean President Chun Doo-Hwan....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Seeks $700,000 in Illegal Proceeds Traced to Ex-South Korea Leader
headline.main: U.S. Seeks $700,000 in Illegal Proceeds Traced to Ex-South Korea Leader

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday it has sued in court to recover $700,000 in alleged corruption proceeds traced to former South Korean President Chun Doo-Hwan.
